markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Peachwood Weapon](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3472)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Tian Xia Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=230) pg. 130, [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 20

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** varies by weapon

**Bulk**  varies by weapon
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

**Base Material** [Peachwood](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3470)

</column>

---

Peachwood weapons have an auburn tinge in direct sunlight. Peachwood is treated as duskwood for [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=722) creatures' [resistances](/Rules.aspx?ID=2318)  or [weaknesses](/Rules.aspx?ID=2317) related to duskwood (bypassing a [jiang-shi's](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1909) resistance, for example). In addition, peachwood weapons bypass a small portion of the resistances of any undead creature. [Strikes](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) with a peachwood weapon treat an undead's resistances against physical damage as 2 lower for standard-grade peachwood, and 4 lower for high-grade.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Standard"
>
Peachwood Weapon (Standard-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Tian Xia Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=230) pg. 129, [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 20

**Price** 2,000 gp (+ 200 gp per bulk)

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

**Craft Requirements** At least 250 gp of peachwood + 25 gp per Bulk

<title
level="2"
right="Item 18"
pfs="Standard"
>
Peachwood Weapon (High-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Tian Xia Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=230) pg. 129, [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 20

**Price** 19,000 gp (+ 1,900 gp per Bulk)

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

**Craft Requirements** At least 9,500 gp of peachwood + 950 gp per Bulk
name: Peachwood Weapon
